item.title: Get Gemini’s help in Google Sheets with one simple step.

bullets: AI in Google Sheets makes categorizing, summarizing or even generating hundreds of rows of text quick and painless.
For instance, you can use the AI function to categorize user feedback, summarize product reviews or write personalized copy.
You don’t need to be an AI or spreadsheet expert to do it, either.
Simply type =AI in any cell, along with your instruction for Gemini.
review.headline_rewrite: Get Gemini’s help in Google Sheets with one simple step.

item.title: OpenAI hires the team behind Xcode coding assistant Alex

bullets: Acqui-hires feel like they’re here to stay: The team behind Alex, a popular tool that lets developers use AI models within Apple’s development suite Xcode, is joining OpenAI.
In a post on X, Alex’s founder Daniel Edrisian said the startup’s team is joining OpenAI’s Codex division, which is building the company’s AI coding agent.
Y Combinator-backed Alex was founded in 2024 and sought to integrate AI models into Xcode.
Apple, however, earlier this year updated Xcode to let users tap ChatGPT and other AI models without needing external tools.
Edrisian didn’t mention if this was a reason his startup’s team has joined OpenAI.
“When we started out, Xcode had no AI.
review.headline_rewrite: OpenAI hires the team behind Xcode coding assistant Alex

item.title: Scale AI’s former CTO launches AI agent that could solve big data’s biggest problem

bullets: Isotopes AI came out of stealth on Thursday with a healthy $20 million seed round.

It offers an AI agent to solve a problem that data analytics products have struggled with for decades: The people who know how to run the big data infrastructure are not the ones who actually need to use the data.
With LLMs, business managers can ask questions of their data in natural language.
Isotopes’ agent, Aidnn, can provide answers and draft complex planning documents, gathering data from wherever it’s stored, like finance apps, ERP, CRM, and cloud storage.
Their product is so sophisticated, the startup has already applied for 10 patents, co-founder CEO Arun Murthy told TechCrunch.
In 2011, Yahoo spun it out into a company called Hortonworks, with Murthy as co-founder and chief product officer.
review.headline_rewrite: Scale AI’s former CTO launches AI agent that could solve big data’s biggest problem

item.title: BMW and Qualcomm announce jointly developed driver assistance system

bullets: The jointly developed software stack announced today will be powered by Snapdragon Ride system-on-chips and will make its first formal appearance at IAA Mobility 2025.
An advanced context-aware driving layer uses a combination of rules-based and AI-based models to plan and predict behavior during complex driving scenarios.

The stack also uses what Qualcomm is calling a safety-first approach, which includes cybersecurity features and enforces strict global car safety rules like ISO's Automotive Safety Integrity Levels and Functional Safety standards.

Snapdragon Ride Pilot is now being offered by Qualcomm to all global automakers, and the chipmaker says the system is already validated in 60 countries worldwide, with the aim of availability in more than 100 countries by 2026.
This new partnership is the latest high-tech product for cars from the semiconductor company.
Last year they began working with Google on AI voice systems for vehicles.
review.headline_rewrite: BMW and Qualcomm announce jointly developed driver assistance system

item.title: Sonos' latest sale knocks 20 percent off the Era 300 speaker

bullets: Read more about how we evaluate products.
The same price is available on Amazon, as are some more deals on Sonos products.
Sonos debuted the Era 300 in 2023 as its main spatial audio offering, and we found it to have excellent sound quality, a simple setup process and Trueplay tuning that's super easy to use.
The headphones have come a long way since they first launched, including the introduction of TrueCinema, which works with a Sonos soundbar to create the best spatial audio experience.
review.headline_rewrite: Sonos' latest sale knocks 20 percent off the Era 300 speaker
